patthana14.19:1.1: Saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… nīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.19:2.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
